title: (1) Note - 1 : In Case of any Slum Redevelopment Scheme is in progress and any Slum redevelopment scheme where LOI has been issued, envisaging construction of rehabilitation tenements having individual carpet area of 25
clause_text: (1) Note - 1 : In Case of any Slum Redevelopment Scheme is in progress and any Slum redevelopment scheme where LOI has been issued, envisaging construction of rehabilitation tenements having individual carpet area of 25.0 sq.mt., if full occupation permission has not been granted and if it is structurally not feasible to provide rehabilitation tenements having individual carpet area as per these regulation, without having completely pull down and reconstructed the on-going rehabilitation building(s). Permissible sale component vis-Ã -vis rehab component shall be 1.25:1 subject to maximum in-situ FSI of 4.0.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
